feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and ellipses for punctuation.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical choices and part of speech usage.

feature3.explanation: Both texts show coherence and sentence complexity.

feature4.explanation: Both texts have a similar narrative style and tone.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, there is a moderate confidence that the two texts were written by the same author.
